channel.title: Abhishek Shree
channel.description: I am an undergraduate at Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur. Also I try to blog about the amazing stuff I come across.

item.title: How can my app actually work?
item.description: A summary of learnings and failings and the loop.

item.title: Markdown Guide
item.description: Markdown cheatsheet for all your blogging needs - headers, lists, images, tables and more! An illustrated guide based on Github Flavored Markdown.
item.author: abhishek.shree@outlook.com (Abhishek Shree)
